column4: Hi new to Ubuntu, have issue, my windows all come up completely maximized
: do you use compiz?
: have screenshot?
I am trying to use Compiz
: do you have compiz config settings manager?
Yes
it is enabled still have issue
press ALT+F2 the type in "compiz --replace" and hit enter
: in your Decoration Window plugin settings, make sure the entry for Command is "/usr/bin/compiz-decorator"
: and the entry for Decoration Window is "any"
it's all good then, just to make sure :)
: have you fix it with "compiz --replace" ?
but it keeps happening after reboot?
can you give me a screenshot for your Window Decoration plugin settings?
or maybe there's a wrong settings in the WIndows Rules plugin
just upload to imageshack or something and give me the link :)
http://imageshack.us/
http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/3714/phoenix.png
: check your Windows Rules plugin, make sure it is disabled
not checked
I mean it is disabled
I can do that but windows still come up maximized, all the restore does is get my cube working again
